question_text: Change to indirect speech: She said, 'I will do it tomorrow.'
option_a: She said that she will do it the next day.
option_b: She said that she would do it tomorrow.
option_c: She said that she would do it the next day.
option_d: She said that I would do it the next day.
explanation: In indirect speech, 'will' changes to 'would' and 'tomorrow' changes to 'the next day'.
